00029 typedef boost::shared_ptr<ppio_ppdev> ppio_ppdev_sptr;

00035 class ppio_ppdev : public ppio {
00036   friend ppio_ppdev_sptr make_ppio_ppdev (int which = 0);
00037   ppio_ppdev (int which = 0);
00038 
00039  public:
00040   virtual ~ppio_ppdev ();
00041 
00042   virtual void write_data (unsigned char v);
00043   virtual unsigned char read_data ();
00044   virtual void write_control (unsigned char v);
00045   virtual unsigned char read_control ();
00046   virtual unsigned char read_status ();
00047 
00048   virtual void lock ();
00049   virtual void unlock ();

00052   int   d_fd;
00053 };
